attributes.action: reduce/ abolish university fees for students
attributes.additional_details: we believe that further education and people who wish to seek it should not be held back or restricted due to financial and funding difficulties. Our country needs educated people and skilled workers and by reducing/ abolishing costs of receiving the necessary education for this we will be able to move forward with a higher percentage of well trained and educated people in our society.
attributes.background: we would like to spark a discussion and debate surrounding the current cost and subsequent debts being paid by university students

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Abolish tuition fees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631025

Reduce maximum tuition fees from £9,250 to £5,000: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622158
